device_models: Kinect v1; Kinect V2; Leap motion; iBeacon
devices_included: Phone; Tablet; Smart watch; Public display; Whiteboard, large vertical display; Tabletop, large horizontal display; Tangibles; Laptop; Desktop computer; Other devices
use_cases_desc: Work with geo-spatial data and multi-device environment for emergency response.
contribution_desc: The Society of Devices (SoD) Toolkit. The toolkit enables the developing and exploring of cross-device and spatial aware ubiquitous environments. The toolkit allows for "plug-and-play" of a number of off-the-shelf hardware sensors and devices, and provides an abstraction over network, device management etc. The toolkit is evaluated through two case studies developed with users.
toolkits: Javascript; HTML5; Android; iOS; Windows; NodeJS
crossdevice_def: "The capabilities of these devices can be expanded significantly when used collectively with other devices and sensors, effectively creating multi-device ubiquitous environments. Ubiquitous environments provide people with access to their information across many of their devices, with some devices being spatially aware of other devices in the environment."
